  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User(String userID, String email, String fName, String mName, String sName)
      Constructs a new User object with basic profile information. The user password is initially null and must be set separately.
      Parameters:
      userID - the unique identifier for the user
      email - the user's email address
      fName - the user's first name
      mName - the user's middle name (can be null or empty)
      sName - the user's surname/last name

  • Method Details

    • getUserID

      public String getUserID()
      Returns the user's unique identifier.
      Returns:
      the user ID as a String

    • setUserID

      public void setUserID(String userID)
      Sets the user's unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      userID - the new user ID to set

    • getUserEmail

      public String getUserEmail()
      Returns the user's email address.
      Returns:
      the user email as a String

    • setUserEmail

      public void setUserEmail(String email)
      Sets the user's email address.
      Parameters:
      email - the new email address to set

    • getUserPassword

      public String getUserPassword()
      Returns the user's current password.
      Returns:
      the user password as a String, or null if not set

    • setUserPassword

      public boolean setUserPassword(String pw)
      Sets or changes the user's password with security validation. Password must be at least 6 characters long and different from the current password.
      Parameters:
      pw - the new password to set
      Returns:
      true if password was successfully set, false if validation failed

    • addBank

      public void addBank(String bankName, String bankAccNum)
      Adds a new bank account to the user's profile.
      Parameters:
      bankName - the name of the bank
      bankAccNum - the bank account number

    • removeBank

      public boolean removeBank(String bankAccNum)
      Removes a bank account from the user's profile using the account number.
      Parameters:
      bankAccNum - the bank account number to remove
      Returns:
      true if the bank was successfully removed, false if not found

    • getFullName

      public String getFullName()
      Returns the user's full name in formatted form. Includes middle name if available, otherwise returns first and last name only.
      Returns:
      the full name as a formatted String

    • getUserBanks

      public ArrayList<Bank> getUserBanks()
      Returns a copy of the user's bank accounts list.
      Returns:
      a new ArrayList containing the user's Bank objects

    • getBankCount

      public int getBankCount()
      Returns the number of bank accounts associated with the user.
      Returns:
      the count of bank accounts as an integer

    • hasBank

      public boolean hasBank(String bankAccNum)
      Checks if the user has a specific bank account by account number.
      Parameters:
      bankAccNum - the bank account number to search for
      Returns:
      true if the bank account exists, false otherwise
